郈，汉字，读作 hòu，指古地名，在今中国山东省东平县。
郈, a Chinese character pronounced hòu, refers to an ancient place name in Dongping County, Shandong Province, China.

郈字的基本解释

郈
hòu
古地名，在今中国山东省东平县。

郈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hòu］
［《廣韻》胡口切，上厚，匣。］
(1)古邑名。春秋鲁叔孙氏邑。故地在今山东东平东南。
(2)姓。春秋时，鲁有郈成子、郈昭伯。

郈字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郈； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1271第08
【唐韻】【正韻】胡口切【集韻】【韻會】很口切，?音厚。魯邑名。【春秋·定十年】叔孫州仇仲孫何忌，帥師圍郈。【註】叔孫氏邑。　又姓。【廣韻】魯大夫郈昭伯。後漢郈常。　又【集韻】胡溝切，音侯。又【廣韻】下遘切【韻會】【正韻】胡茂切，?音?。義?同。

考證：〔【春秋·定九年】叔孫何忌，帥師圍郈。【註】在東平無鹽縣東南。〕　謹照原文九年改十年。叔孫下增州仇仲孫四字。在東平無鹽縣東南改叔孫氏邑。

Basic explanation of words
郈
hòu
Ancient place names, in today's Dongping County, Shandong Province, China.
郈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hòu］
["Guangyun" hukou cut, thick top, box. ]
(1) The name of the ancient town. The Spring and Autumn Period Lu Shu Sun's Yi. The old place is southeast of Dongping, Shandong today.
(2) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Lu You Chengzi and Uncle Zhao Zhao.
郈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郈; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1271 08
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu Kouqi [Jiyun] [Yunhui] is very mouth-cut, and the sound is thick. Luyi name. [Spring and Autumn · Ten Years] Shu Sun Zhou Qiu Zhong Sun He Ji, handsome teacher encircles Piao. [Note] Shusun Shiyi.　Another last name. [Guang Yun] Dr. Lu Zhaobo. Later Han Piao Chang.　[Jiyun] Hugouchi, Yinhou. [Guang Yun] Xia Xiaoqie [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Hu Maoqie, "Yin". Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Spring and Autumn·Ding Nine Years] Uncle Sun He Ji, Shuai Shi Wei Piao. [Note] In the southeast of Wuyan County, Dongping. 〕 　 I would like to change the original nine years to ten years. Uncle Sun Xia Zengzhou Chou Zhongsun four characters. In the southeast of Wuyan County, Dongping, it was changed to Shusun Shiyi.
